title: Present Continuous Basics
content: I am [reading|read] a book right now. She is [sleeping|sleep] in her room.
explanationEnUs: Use 'am/is/are' + verb-ing for actions happening right now.
explanationZhTw: 使用 'am/is/are' + 動詞-ing 表示現在正在發生的動作。
explanationZhCn: 使用 'am/is/are' + 动词-ing 表示现在正在发生的动作。

title: Spelling Rules (-e)
content: He is [making|makeing] a cake. She is [writing|writeing] a letter.
explanationEnUs: For verbs ending in 'e', drop the 'e' before adding 'ing' (make -> making).
explanationZhTw: 對於以 'e' 結尾的動詞，在加 'ing' 之前去掉 'e' (make -> making)。
explanationZhCn: 对于以 'e' 结尾的动词，在加 'ing' 之前去掉 'e' (make -> making)。

title: Spelling Rules (Double Consonant)
content: He is [sitting|siting] on the chair. They are [running|runing] fast.
explanationEnUs: For one-syllable verbs ending in vowel+consonant, double the consonant (sit -> sitting).
explanationZhTw: 對於以母音+子音結尾的單音節動詞，重複子音 (sit -> sitting)。
explanationZhCn: 对于以元音+辅音结尾的单音节动词，重复辅音 (sit -> sitting)。

title: Present Continuous for Future
content: I am [meeting|meet] him tomorrow. We are [leaving|leave] next week.
explanationEnUs: Present Continuous can also describe planned future arrangements.
explanationZhTw: 現在進行式也可以描述計劃好的未來安排。
explanationZhCn: 现在进行时也可以描述计划好的未来安排。

title: Non-Action Verbs
content: I [know|knowing] the answer. She [likes|liking] chocolate. (Not: is knowing/is liking)
explanationEnUs: Stative verbs (know, like, want, need) are usually not used in continuous forms.
explanationZhTw: 狀態動詞 (know, like, want, need) 通常不用於進行式。
explanationZhCn: 状态动词 (know, like, want, need) 通常不用于进行式。
